In 2002, Slovene w__ the nat___ language o_ around 88 % o_ Slovenia's population acco_____ to t__ census, wi__ more th__ 92 % of t__ Slovenian popul_____ speaking i_ in th___ home envir______. data.fullContent: The official language in Slovenia is Slovene, which is a member of the South Slavic language group. In 2002, Slovene was the native language of around 88 % of Slovenia's population according to the census, with more than 92 % of the Slovenian population speaking it in their home environment. This statistic ranks Slovenia among the most homogeneous countries in the EU in terms of the share of speakers of the predominant mother tongue.
data.answer: 斯洛文尼亚的官方语言是斯洛文尼亚语，它是南斯拉夫语系的一员。2002年，根据人口普查，斯洛文尼亚约88%的人口说斯洛文尼亚语，超过92%的斯洛文尼亚人在家里说斯洛文尼亚语。根据主要母语使用者的比例，这一统计数据将斯洛文尼亚列为欧盟中最同质的国家之一。
